title: b1 player looking for team
body:
aight look i've only been playing this game for maybe 6-7 months im pretty bad as the rank might suggest.

 I'm just tryna find some people to play with and grow as a player with, I'm a really chill player (meaning i never flame)  looking for other chill players to create a team (to improve)





ty :))

replies.body: hey if you would like to join our team it would be great, we are just starting off but we are looking for new players. join our discord https://discord.gg/8RnA8M
you wanna have a team or a coach duo? :)
